lead_paragraph: KAPLAN--Joel "Gonk," died on Tuesday, December 29, 2015, in his home in Wallkill, NY after a long illness. He was born in Brooklyn and was the son of the late Florence and Harry Kaplan. He was predeceased by his twin brother Ira Kaplan. He is survived by his loving wife Carol Kaplan; sons Laurence Berland and Noah Berland; brothers Steven Kaplan and Richard Kaplan; sister-in-law Jo-Ann Segal; brother-in-law Keith Crossley; sisters-in-law Denise Kaplan, Ann Johnson, and Sherry Kaplan; nieces and nephews Michelle Kratochvil, Michael Kaplan, Rachel Newell, and Casiel Kaplan. Joel was a true Renaissance Man and salt of the earth who was loved by all he touched. He will be deeply missed by all. Donations can be made to the Perlmutter Cancer Center, NYU Langone Medical Center, Lung Cancer Research Fund. Graveside service Sunday, 11am, Wellwood Cemetery. For further information, visit www.jewish-funeral- home.com. 1/3
